titles.title: Presidential FEMA Reform Act of 1995
To direct the President to establish a commission for making recommendations to improve the Federal emergency management system.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 1/24/1995--Introduced. Presidential FEMA Reform Act of 1995 - Directs the President to establish a commission to review the Federal emergency management system and to report to him and the Congress on recommendations for improving the system.
